Q_DESC:
N bodies of masses are placed uniformly in a specific arrangement, such that some particular triplets when placed together will make the gravitational field zero.So,find these particular triplets.
Input:

The first line of input contains N.And the next line has N separated integers denoting the masses.(which are in terms of A[i]m)

Output:

Output contains the triplets each in new line and the members of triplets separated by comma and enclosed in parenthesis"()".Print "No Triplet Found" if no triplets are found.

Constraints:

1<=N<=1000
-1000<=A[]<=1000
